body.raw:
{
  "name": "Test Monitoring Job",
  "description": "A test monitoring job.",
  "service": "{{service_id}}",
  "layer": "{{layer_id}}",
  "schedule_expression": "0 */15 * * * *",
  "is_active": true,
  "max_runtime_minutes": 60,
  "detection_algorithm": "simple_count",
  "change_threshold": 5.0,
  "alert_on_changes": true,
  "alert_on_errors": true,
  "alert_threshold": "medium"
}

{
  "name": "Test Monitoring Rule",
  "description": "A test monitoring rule.",
  "rule_type": "threshold_breach",
  "expression": "{\"field\": \"population\", \"operator\": \"gt\", \"value\": 1000}",
  "severity": "high",
  "is_active": true,
  "check_frequency_minutes": 60,
  "notification_channels": ["email", "in_app"],
  "auto_resolve": true,
  "auto_resolve_duration_hours": 24,
  "suppress_similar": true,
  "suppression_duration_minutes": 30
}

{
  "title": "Test Alert",
  "description": "This is a test alert.",
  "alert_id": "TEST-001",
  "category": "change_detection",
  "severity": "high",
  "service": "{{service_id}}",
  "layer": "{{layer_id}}",
  "assigned_to": "{{user_id}}",
  "auto_resolve": true,
  "auto_resolve_duration": 2,
  "suppress_similar": true,
  "suppression_duration": 30
}

{
  "title": "Test Notification",
  "message": "This is a test notification.",
  "short_message": "Test notif",
  "notification_type": "alert",
  "priority": "high",
  "is_read": false,
  "link": "/alerts/{{alert_id}}",
  "action_text": "View Alert",
  "action_url": "/alerts/{{alert_id}}",
  "metadata": {"test": "data"},
  "alert": "{{alert_id}}",
  "expires_at": "2024-12-31T23:59:59Z",
  "group_key": "test-group"
}

{
  "email_enabled": true,
  "sms_enabled": false,
  "push_enabled": true,
  "in_app_enabled": true,
  "email_alert_notifications": true,
  "quiet_hours_enabled": false,
  "digest_enabled": false,
  "min_alert_severity": "medium"
}

{
  "name": "Test Report",
  "description": "This is a test report.",
  "report_id": "TEST-REP-001",
  "report_type": "monitoring_summary",
  "format_type": "pdf",
  "service": "{{service_id}}",
  "layer": "{{layer_id}}",
  "assigned_to": "{{user_id}}",
  "auto_resolve": true,
  "auto_resolve_duration": 2,
  "suppress_similar": true,
  "suppression_duration": 30
}

{
  "name": "Daily Test Report Schedule",
  "description": "Run test report daily",
  "schedule_expression": "0 2 * * *",
  "is_active": true,
  "max_runtime_minutes": 60,
  "detection_algorithm": "simple_count",
  "change_threshold": 5.0,
  "alert_on_changes": true,
  "alert_on_errors": true,
  "alert_threshold": "medium"
}
